Built from "recovered"alient technology, Rocket's shield system charges anytime he Dodges back and holds Block for at least 1.50 seconeds. Each shield loses power as it is used in combat.
Kinetic Shield: 4 charges of Physical Resistance, each providing 439.02 Resistance.
Shell Shield: 4 charges of Armor Up, each providing 298.85 Armor Rating.
Emergency Shield: 3 charges of Special Attack resistance, each providing 20% Resistance.
